TopicTitle: Career mode starts with level 3 r&d

Articles.Content:
I recently started a new career mode, but the r&d building started at level 3. So I deleted it and made a new one, but the same thing happened. Screenshot of my gamedata: https://www.dropbox.com/s/63xx18vzwqwv1qo/Untitled.png?dl=0.

How can i fix this?

Edited May 7, 2020 by Weimaraner

Same here, got a clean install yesterday caused by some old mods incompatibility, installed something like 70 mods and started a new game, it was ok. Today I added a bunch of mods and started a new game again and I got lvl3 R&D at start.

 

Last mods were:

kerbin side Gap

Unkerballed starts

Firespitter core

Firespitter resource config

Airplane plus

Custom barn kit.

I think one of them is the problem and if I have to point my finger on one of them I would guess on custom barn kit. 

Anyway I just found a tweak. Ctrl+right click R&D, there will pop up an option to demolish it, do that, than ctrl+rightclick again and rebuild lvl2. Repeat to lvl 1 and you'll be done.

Edited May 12, 2020 by Brewgo
Detail added
